Text: Took you long enough! This would never have happened at the shrine of the god of warm food!
I feel that you lack piety for the god of quiet places. Lower your voice.
I will do no such thing! If Indistille wanted me to keep my voice down, he would have tried harder to keep his shrine well lit.
This is what separates the wheat from the chaff. If you cannot handle this, what use are you to your god?
I'm going to hunt down the person in charge! They'll hear about this! See if I ever come to this backwater village ever again!
Well, I think your mask looks stupid.
Hello again! Fancy seeing you here.
Well, we're kind of just sitting here.
Welp, I guess you should run along now!
